## GUI Git Clients

- [RStudio](https://rstudio.com) -- Free. Great for useRs
- [Sublime's Merge](https://www.sublimemerge.com/) --   Downloaded and evaluated for free. $100 / 3-years of upgrades.  
- GitKracken -- **Free** if you have the [GitHub Student](https://education.github.com/pack) Pack or the [GitHub Teacher toolbox](https://www.gitkraken.com/github-teacher-toolbox)
- [SourceTree](https://www.sourcetreeapp.com/) --  Free. (defaults to use with [BitBucket](https://bitbucket.org/))
